mapper.insert: insert into notification (user_id, target_user_id, category, timestamp, target_event_id) values (#{user_id}, #{target_user_id}, #{category}, now(), #{target_event_id})
mapper.select: select n.*, u.profile_url, u.profile_filter from notification as n join users as u on (n.user_id = u.user_id) where target_user_id = #{user_id}
select n.*, u.profile_url, u.profile_filter from notification as n join users as u on (n.user_id = u.user_id) where target_user_id = #{user_id} and is_checked = false
mapper.delete: delete from notification where category in ('like', 'scrap', 'report') and content_id = #{content_id}
